newsitem.title: UK: PRESS DIGEST - London-based Arab newspapers - July 9.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - London-based Arab newspapers - July 9.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in two London-based Arabic-language newspapers on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Four new ministers in new Egyptian cabinet.
- Iraq excluded from eighth Pan Arab Games which open in Beirut on Saturday. Sudan not participating.
- Investcorp sells Prime Service to Atlas Copco .
- Saudi French Bank net profit in the first six months of 1997 at 208 million riyals, up 13.6 percent on a year earlier.
- Saudi and Iranian firms sign four trade deals.
